title: Bug 131465Fetching date from MySQL returns bogus values
OB: Bug 131465Fetching date from MySQL returns bogus values 1) In MySQL I have a table with a column of type integer (Year int(11).2) I run the following SQL statementSELECT dateformat(makedate(year, 1), "%Y") FROM census c3) Which returns the following1980199020004) When I run the same query inside a data set I get the following:31 39 38 3031 39 39 3032 30 30 30This looks like hex code that is not being translated back to character format.
SR: 1) In MySQL I have a table with a column of type integer (Year int(11).2) I run the following SQL statementSELECT dateformat(makedate(year, 1), "%Y") FROM census c3) Which returns the following1980199020004) When I run the same query inside a data set I get the following:31 39 38 3031 39 39 3032 30 30 30This looks like hex code that is not being translated back to character format.
